item.title: Fundamentals of Callbacks for Swift Developers
item.description:
Updated on October 12, 2016 â€“ Swift 3.0 Callbacks: What are they? How do they work? What are they used for in practice? My goal in this article is to provide answers to these questions so that you have a foundational understanding of this common programming pattern in iOS development.
What are callbacks? Let’s approach the definition from a “big picture” scenario: When we’re building software, we’re either using APIs, or building APIs, are we not?
